chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat (umpl_conv_0 s0) (umpl_conv_0 s1)

Premises:
umpl_conv_0 = fix umpl_conv_0 (s : state) : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a p => M1 prec_list a (upl_conv_0 p) | @M2 _ p0 p1 => M2 prec_list (umpl_conv_0 p0) (umpl_conv_0 p1) end : state -> state
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
mpl_compat_sym : forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0
mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
st_compatible_compat : forall s0 s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1
union_sd : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) /\ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl)
st_compatible_compat_def = fun s0 : state => forall s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : state -> Prop
union_str : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s1 (app c tl)
union_std_def = fun s0 : state => forall (s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) /\ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
union_str_def = fun s0 : state => forall (s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s1 (app c tl) : state -> Prop
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
union_state : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (t : term), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) t < -> state_reconnait d s0 t \/ state_reconnait d s1 t
mpl_compat_3 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
udta_conv_0_aux = fix udta_conv_0_aux (d : preDTA) : preDTA := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a s => M1 state a (umpl_conv_0 s) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => M2 state (udta_conv_0_aux s0) (udta_conv_0_aux s1) end : preDTA -> preDTA
mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
umpl_conv_1_inj : forall s0 s1 : state, umpl_conv_1 s0 = umpl_conv_1 s1 -> s0 = s1
umpl_conv_0_inj : forall s0 s1 : state, umpl_conv_0 s0 = umpl_conv_0 s1 -> s0 = s1
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
union_s0d_2_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (app 1%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 1%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 1%N tl)
union_s0d_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (app 0%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 0%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 0%N tl)
union_mpl_0 = fix union_mpl_0 (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M1 prec_list c pl | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => if (c =? c0)%N then M1 prec_list c (union_pl pl pl0) else MapMerge prec_list (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match c with | 0%N => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 0%N pl s0) s1 | N.pos (p'~1)%positive => M2 prec_list s0 (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s1) | N.pos (p'~0)%positive => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s0) s1 | 1%N => M2 prec_list s0 (union_mpl_0 0%N pl s1) end end : ad -> prec_list -> state -> state
udta_conv_1_aux = fix udta_conv_1_aux (d : preDTA) : preDTA := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a s => M1 state a (umpl_conv_1 s) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => M2 state (udta_conv_1_aux s0) (udta_conv_1_aux s1) end : preDTA -> preDTA
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
u_conv_disj : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a1 = Some s1 -> a0 <> a1
u_conv_0_invar_6 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0
u_conv_0_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
u_conv_0_invar_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some (umpl_conv_0 ladj) -> MapGet state d a = Some ladj
u_conv_0_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some (umpl_conv_0 ladj)
insert_ostate_8 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), mpl_compat s0' s1' -> MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> a = new_preDTA_ad (u_merge d0 d1) -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t \/ reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) a t
u_conv_0_invar_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0
insert_ostate_7 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), mpl_compat s0' s1' -> MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> a <> uad_conv_1 a1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t \/ reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) a t
insert_ostate_6 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), mpl_compat s0' s1' -> MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> a <> uad_conv_1 a1 ->...-> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) a t
union_mpl = fix union_mpl (s0 s1 : state) {struct s0} : state := match s0 with | @M0 _ => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_mpl_0 c1 pl1 s0 | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 prec_list s10 s11 end | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => match s1 with | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_mpl_0 c1 pl1 s0 | _ => union_mpl_0 c0 pl0 s1 end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M2 prec_list s00 s01 | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_mpl_0 c1 pl1 s0 | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 prec_list (union_mpl s00 s10) (union_mpl s01 s11) end end : state -> state -> state
insert_ostate_1 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_0 a0) t
insert_ostate_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_1 a1 -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_1 a1) t
insert_ostate_3 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_0 a0) t < -> state_reconnait (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) s0' t

```  
intros s0 s1 H.
unfold mpl_compat in *.
intros c p0 p1 H0 H1.
unfold umpl_conv_0.
destruct s0; destruct s1; simpl in *; intros.
- inversion H; subst; auto.
- inversion H; subst; auto.
- inversion H; subst; auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros s0 s1 H. unfold mpl_compat in *. intros c p0 p1 H0 H1. unfold umpl_conv_0. destruct s0; destruct s1; simpl in *; intros. - inversion H; subst; auto. - inversion H; subst; auto. - inversion H; subst; auto.
